name: Vikings VR: Rock the Balls PRO
name_original: Vikings VR: Rock the Balls PRO
description:
Vikings VR: Rock the Balls - unique VR runner. Put iPhone in cardboard and go to the real adventure - hateful vikings, giants form Jotunheim and even animals - all of them are going up against you! 
If you don’t have a cardboard - it’s not a problem. We made a mode without using VR - just tap on screen and hold iPhone in your hands and play.

Features:
- A wide variety of the in-game objects: vikings, land mines, totems, stockades and much more !
- Dynamic surroundings: green meadows, rough snow-covered forests, deadly slopes of volcanic mountains.
- Awesome driving music.
- We have cookies… and vikings
